Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

This may include the #97 Skokie bus.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Ebehert
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, King Drive, 76th, Cottage Grove, and 79th due to, street blockage at 79th/Ebehert.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, King Drive, 76th, Cottage Grove, and 79th due to, street blockage at 79th/Ebehert.

Allow extra travel time.
